example.title: Scrolling
example.metakeywords: php tab, php tab menu, php tabstrip, ajax tab menu
example.metadescription: Fast rendering, Flexible CSS Style and Search Engine Friendly make KoolTabs the great PHP Tab Menu solution for your website navigation system.
example.description:
In case you have too many tabs, you can easily make the tabstrip scrollable by setting the scroll property. There are 3 allowed values:

  • left - Scroll arrow buttons are on the left
  • right - Scroll arrow buttons are on the right
  • middle - One buttons is on the left, another is on the right
